original_title: Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg: Bayreuther Festspiele
overview: The high-point of the 2017 Bayreuth Festival, Barrie Kosky’s astonishingly entertaining and convincing new Meistersinger is a triumph: a production of enormous insight and great quality... that plumbs the depths of both the opera and its composer.
title: Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg: Bayreuther Festspiele
